name: Vermona PERfourMER MKII
details:
quad analog synthesizerSynthesizer Channel
one analogue oscillator with sine-, triangle-, square-, and sawtooth-waveform, white noise generator or external audio signal
PWM via LFO or MIDI (modulation wheel CC#1)
one lowpass filter with 24 db/octave and resonance
one LFO with sawtooth (down), square, sine and sample & hold
one ADSR envelope generator for VCO (pitch), VCF and VCA
Interaction between Synthesizer Channels
frequency modulation of VCO or VCF
oscillator synchronization (hard-sync)
playmodes for connected Synthesizer Channels
M1 - monophonic, unison
M2 - monophonic, rotating
D1 - duophonic, unison
D2 - duophonic, rotating
P1, P2 - polyphonic
Miscellaneous
power supply: internal PSU (90 V~ bis 240 V~)
dimensions: approx. 43.5 cm x 31.5 cm x 10.5 cm
weight: approx. 3.7 kg
Options:
CV/Gate inputs (has to be ordered with the PERfourMER MKII and can only be installed by Vermona afterwards)
wooden side panels
